```{r}
listFunctions <- function(filename) {
  temp.env <- new.env()
  sys.source(filename, envir = temp.env)
  functions <- lsf.str(envir=temp.env)
  rm(temp.env)
  return(functions)
}

listFunctions("malaria_code_fromBeth.R")
```
